alert.note: Alert for Southeast Gila County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 18 at 3:20PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Gila County through 345 PM MST... At 319 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles northwest of Hilltop, or 27 miles northeast of Globe. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hilltop. This includes US Highway 60 between mile markers 277 and 297. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Persons in campgrounds should consider seeking sturdy shelter until this storm passes.
